item.title: Warning no longer in force: Tidal River Avon at Bristol, Pill and Shirehampton
item.description: This flood alert is no longer in force as tides are now falling and no longer pose a risk of flooding.

item.title: Warning no longer in force: Wye Estuary in Gloucestershire
item.description:
This Flood Alert has been removed. Tidal forecasts are now below the flooding threshold.
We continue to monitor the situation.
